summary: Frontend implements a single-page shirt storefront UI with a two-image gallery and a Buy Now button that opens a Cash App instructions modal. Styling/theme is customized via Tailwind/CSS variables. However, the diff does not show the required image assets being added, and it introduces unrequested authentication/actor infrastructure (Internet Identity, react-query actor hook) and an empty backend actor.

missing_requirements.requirement: Both uploaded images (Photoroom_20260118_154454.jpeg and Photoroom_20260118_154454-1.jpeg) are included as static frontend assets and render on the product page.
missing_requirements.reason: The product page references image paths under /assets, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added as static assets, so inclusion cannot be verified from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and related hooks (user authentication scaffolding).
hallucinated_features.reason: User accounts/authentication were explicitly listed as non-goals, but the diff adds an InternetIdentityProvider and substantial auth-client logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor scaffolding and frontend actor hook/react-query integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend functionality or actor-based authenticated/anonymous actor plumbing was requested for the single product storefront.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy-to-clipboard UX for Cash App cashtag.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only requested manual instructions in a modal with close/dismiss; copy-to-clipboard is additional behavior not requested.
